r.d: Support for YAML 1.1 (YAML Ain't Markup Language) serialization using the LibYAML library.
r.n: New Features: - Add a composer.json to enable support for PIE (asgrim) Bugs Fixed: - #97: Ignore null array offset warnings in explicit null tests (bd808) - avoid unexpected NAN value was coerced to string (remicollet)
